original_text: King Solomon gave to the Queen of Sheba everything that she wanted. He gave more things to her than she had brought to him. Then she left with all her servants and she returned to her own country.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 스바 여왕이 가져온 대로 답례하고 그 외에 또 그의 소원대로 구하는 것을 모두 주니 이에 그가 그의 신하들과 더불어 본국으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: King Solomon gave to the Queen of Sheba
He gave more things to her
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀에게 더 많은 것을 주었다

sentences.original_text: than she had brought to him
and she returned to her own country
